title: PetroChina 3Q Net Profit Plunged 58% on Year
text:
By Justina Lee

PetroChina Co. (0857.HK) posted a 58% drop in third-quarter net profit, partly due to lower global oil prices and intense competition in the domestic market.

Net profit was 8.83 billion Chinese yuan ($1.25 billion), compared with CNY21.22 billion in the same quarter a year ago, PetroChina said Wednesday.

However, revenue rose 1.8% on year to CNY618.14 billion.

For the nine-month period, net profit fell 23.4% to CNY37.25 billion, while revenue rose 5.1% to CNY1.814 trillion.
